9502G0080-d-02-09-95-SOO.Narrative: TRAIN 200 WHILE TRAVELING EASTWARD AT 47 MPH ON THE EASTWARD MAIN TRK DEERAILED 12 CARS. THE DERAILED CARS STRUCK TRAIN 615 WHILE STANDING ON THE WESTWARD MAIN DERAILING 56 CARS/ AS TRAIN 200 WAS PASSING TRAIN 615 WHICH WAS STANDING AT THE END OF DOUBLE TRK, A BROKEN WHEEL ON SOO 75712, LOADED COVERED HOPPER, 58TH CAR, CAUSED THE CAR TO DERAIL ALONG WITH THE 59TH THRU 69TH CARS OF TRAIN 200. AS THE CARS DERAILED THEY STRUCK TRAIN 615, CAUSING A CASCADING REACTION WHICH RESULTED IN THE REAR 56 EMPTY TANK CARS TO FLIP OVER ON THEIR SIDES. APPROX 1,000 FT OF TRK WAS DAMAGED. ONE CAR ON TRAIN 200,PROX 41040 CONTAINED A HAZ MAT, VINYL ACETATE. THE CAR WAS OFF THE TRKS, BUT WAS NOT LEAKING. THE CAR WAS RERAILED. TRAIN 615'S CREW NOTICED SPARKS COMING FROM THE WHEELS OF ONE OF THE CARS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ONCOMING TRAIN AND TRIED UNSUCCESSFULLY TO RADIO IT TO STOP. THE CREWS OF BOTH TRAINS WERE TAKEN IN FOR TESTING UNDER FRA GUIDELINES, WITH NEGATIVE RESULTS. NO DISCIPLINARY ACTION WAS TAKEN.NoneNoneNoneNone

9502G0081-d-02-18-95-SOO.Narrative: TRAIN 222 WHILE TRAVELING EASTWARD AT 5 MPH ON YARD TRK 3 DERAILED 5 CARS. THE CREW DOUBLED THEIR TRAIN TOGETHER AND SHOVED OUT THE WEST END OF TRK 3 TO COMPLETE THEIR AIR TEST. DURING THE AIR TEST, 3BAD ORDER CARS WERE FOUND. THE TRAIN WAS PULLED UP & THE BAD ORDER CARS WERE SET OUT OF THE TRAIN.THE BACKUP MOVE WAS MADE TO CLEAR TRAIN 229 ARRIVING AT WEST DAVENPORT. THE SWITCH ENGINE FROM NAHANT DELIVERED CARS TO WEST DAVENPORT AT THE WEST END OF THE YD. UNAWARE THAT TRAIN 222 HAD NOT LEFT TOWN, THE NAHANT ASSIGNMENT ALIGNED THE WEST END OF TRK 3 & DID NOT REALIGN FOR MOVEMENT ON TRK 3 AFTER COMPLETING THEIR MOVE. WHEN TRAIN 222 MADE A BACKUP MOVE, NO 3 SWITCH WAS RUN THROUGH. WHEN THE TRAIN THEN PROCEEDED EAST, THE DERAILMENT OCCURRED AT NO 3 SWITCH.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

THE ENGINEER BECAME AWARE THAT HIS TRAIN BRAKES WERE NOT FUNCTIONING WHEN HE WAS APPROX 15 MILES EAST OF STEVENS POINT YD WHILE TRAVELING AT 41.7 MPH, & PUT THE LOCO CONSIST INTO EMERGENCY. TRAIN T002 WAS SCHEDULED TO MEET TRAIN L023AT THE SIDING IN NELSONS. ONCE TRAIN T002 ENTERED THE SIDING, AND IT WAS DETERMINED THEY WOULD BE UNABLE TO STOP, THE ENGINEER & CONDUCTOR JUMPED OFF THE TRAIN. THE ENGINEER SUFFERED A FRACTURED COLLARBONE & CONTUSIONS. THE CONDUCTOR WAS UNINJURED. UNATTENDED TRAIN T002 CONTINUED THROUGH THE POWERSWITCH. TRAIN #L023, A WESTBOUND TRAIN, HAD ENOUGH ADVANCED WARNING TO ENABLE THE ENGINEER TO BRINGHIS TRAIN TO AN EMERGENCY STOP. THE LEAD LOCOS OF BOTH TRAINS SUSTAINED DAMAGE BUT WERE NOT DERAILEDIN THE COLLSION.NoneNoneNoneNoneNone
